discussion.author: CohenCyril
discussion.comment:
Hi @jouvelot, thank you for your contribution.
I didn't have the time to look at the substance of your PR yet, but on the form:
1. please never merge anything in your PR branches, use only rebase (e.g. use`git pull -r upstream master`)
2. please never use your own master branch to make PR (one reason being it often triggers unwanted occurences of 1.)

discussion.author: jouvelot
discussion.comment: Thanks for the advice, @CohenCyril. Should I submit a cleaner PR?

discussion.author: CohenCyril
discussion.comment:
> Thanks for the advice, @CohenCyril. Should I submit a cleaner PR?

Yes please :pray:

commits.author: jouvelot
commits.message: Adding sumn_set_nthE and sumn_nconsE to bigop.v.
